chapter.title: Deployment Elements
chapter.para: Deployment elements, test-install, test-update, publish, iso and files support repository testing and distribution.
The test-install, test-update and publish elements follow a common model. The model is described first in . Differences from the model are described in the section for each element.
The iso element controls the creation of CD/DVD disk images, typically used in manual system repository installation.
The files element allows distributing miscellaneous user-provided files and folders, such as readme or licensing files, or configuration templates, along with the repository.
